_comment: Manual provider ID overrides for series that can't be auto-matched due to naming issues.
_instructions: Copy this file to data/manual-ids.json and add entries where the key is the exact series title extracted from your filename (check logs for 'title=' value), and the value is an object with provider IDs. You only need to specify the providers you want to override.

_how_to_find_ids.tmdb: Go to themoviedb.org, search for the series, the ID is in the URL: themoviedb.org/tv/[ID]
_how_to_find_ids.tvdb: Go to thetvdb.com, search for the series, the ID is in the URL: thetvdb.com/dereferrer/series/[ID]
_how_to_find_ids.anilist: Go to anilist.co, search for the anime, the ID is in the URL: anilist.co/anime/[ID]

_example_diddy._note: For 'Sean Diddy Combs Netflix Documentary The Reckoning', you would add:
